debrief.Hypothesis: How people zero in on a decision when they have limited information at their disposal.
debrief.DiagnosticApproach: I try to think of a way split the possibilities about evenly (e.g. I was using time zone initially here so I could picture where the country might be from East to West), then try the same again (e.g. temperature: how near is the country to the equator?). Other than that, I try to pick options where I have some general knowledge and avoid ones where I know I know very little (e.g. sport usually).
